price: 24. Na bongo nde balobaki ete: Móto ekozwa biso sé mikolo mike ya kotanga. Mpe lokuta na bango ekosaki bango na lingomba na bango, na ntina na maye bazalaki kosala ya mabe.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامٗا مَّعۡدُودَٰتٖۖ وَغَرَّهُمۡ فِي دِينِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lan tamassanā al-nāru illā ayyāman maʿdūdātin wagharrahum fī dīnihim mā kānū yaftarūna
